SELECT a.*, b.user_name AS `consultantName`, b.avatar AS `consultantAvatar`, c.name AS `userNickName`, c.avatar AS `userAvatar` FROM psy_consult_order_item a INNER JOIN psy_consult b ON b.id = a.consult_id INNER JOIN psy_consult_order d ON d.id = a.order_id INNER JOIN psy_user c ON c.id = d.user_id
where a.consult_id = #{consultId} a.day= #{day} ORDER BY a.day,time_start asc
